result.name: vat_registered_businesses_-_total_stock_registrations_and_de-registrations_by_broad_industry_group
result.notes:
Total stock of VAT-registered businesses and number of VAT-registered businesses recorded as registering and de-registering during a calendar year, broken down by broad industry group
Source: Business Registers Unit (BRU)
Publisher: Business Registers Unit (BRU)
Geographies: Local Authority District (LAD), County/Unitary Authority, Government Office Region (GOR), National
Geographic coverage: UK
Time coverage: 1994 to 2008
Type of data: Administrative data

odi-certificate.title: VAT registered businesses: total stock, registrations and de-registrations by broad industry group

organization.name: office-for-national-statistics
organization.title: Office for National Statistics
organization.description:
The Office for National Statistics (ONS) is the UK’s largest independent producer of official statistics and is the recognised national statistical institute for the UK. It is responsible for collecting and publishing statistics related to the economy, population and society at national, regional and local levels. It also conducts the census in England and Wales every ten years. 

The ONS plays a leading role in national and international good practice in the production of official statistics. It is the executive office of the UK Statistics Authority and although they are separate, they are still closely related.

result.precision: Tends to undercount small businesses because it is a survey based on the list of companies that are liable to pay VAT (turnover threshold of 55,000 pounds).
result.title: VAT registered businesses: total stock, registrations and de-registrations by broad industry group
